description.en:
Frame material: Wood, Glass, back side MDF 2-3mm
Overall frame size: ±35x45x4cm
Depth: ± 3cm
Frame Color: White, Wood Motif
Packing: Black Hardbox + Paperbag
Greeting card: Artcarton 310gr 1 side 10x15cm
Black Envelope: Aster black 150gsm A6 11x16,2cm
Max People: Up to 20 people
Shipping Note: Packing bubblewrap inside and outside the box, generally it's safe for Instant or Regular Shipping. For Cargo to different island or country, please choose acrylic frame.
Note: 12R available for up to 20 people, more than 20 people please choose A2, A1, or A0
description.id: Produk: asli impor bahan dari jerman
